commentary: Naseem Shah to Bumrah, out Caught by Agha Salman,, Holes out on this occasion, Slower ball at 119kph, Bumrah swings across the line and doesn't generate enough power behind the shot
Naseem Shah to Bumrah, FOUR, 139kph, fuller in length, Bumrah takes the aerial route to hit it straight of mid-off
Naseem Shah to Siraj, 1 run, short of length delivery, tapped to the right of backward point
Naseem Shah to Kuldeep Yadav, out Caught by Rizwan,, 141kph, short of a good length delivery, Kuldeep Yadav looks to guide it behind square and gets an outside nick
Naseem Shah to Kuldeep Yadav, no run, B0$, length ball, Kuldeep Yadav taps it to backward point with an opened bat-face
Shaheen Afridi to Bumrah, no run, 135kph, over the wicket, away-slanter from a short of length, Bumrah lets it be by shouldering arms
Shaheen Afridi to Kuldeep Yadav, 1 run, 135kph, Kuldeep Yadav knocks this full delivery towards mid-on for a quick single
Shaheen Afridi to Kuldeep Yadav, no run, 118kph, slow and full, played back at the bowler
Shaheen Afridi to Bumrah, 1 run, off-speed again, angled in on middle, a shuffling Bumrah turns it to mid-wicket
Shaheen Afridi to Bumrah, no run, 122kph, slower ball, yorker length outside off, Bumrah fails to lay bat on ball as he tries to steer it behind square
Shaheen Afridi to Kuldeep Yadav, 1 run, 134kph, width on offer, Kuldeep Yadav guides it to third man
Shaheen Afridi to Kuldeep Yadav, wide, 135kph, Afridi spills one down leg
Haris Rauf to Bumrah, no run, 143kph, length ball that holds its line outside off, Bumrah sticks his bat out and is beaten on the outside edge
Haris Rauf to Bumrah, FOUR, 146kph, Haris Rauf overpitches and Bumrah plays a cracking shot
Haris Rauf to Bumrah, no run, 144kph, pitched up, a shuffling Bumrah drives to mid-on
Haris Rauf to Kuldeep Yadav, 1 run, 144kph, keeps a bit low does this length ball, nudged into the on-side for a risky single
Haris Rauf to Kuldeep Yadav, no run, 145kph, almost in the blockhole darted in, dug out into the off-side
Haris Rauf to Kuldeep Yadav, no run, 143kph, yorker outside off, squeezed towards backward point
Shaheen Afridi to Kuldeep Yadav, 1 run, 138kph, tapped into the off-side for a sharp single
Shaheen Afridi to Kuldeep Yadav, no run, 139kph, wider line and Kuldeep Yadav chases it with an opened bat-face
Shaheen Afridi to Kuldeep Yadav, no run, 138kph, yorker, jammed back to the bowler off the toe end of the bat
Shaheen Afridi to Bumrah, 1 run, 134kph, low full toss, Bumrah opens his bat-face to steer it to third man
Shaheen Afridi to Bumrah, FOUR, Bumrah takes the aerial route and makes good contact
Shaheen Afridi to Bumrah, no run, 137kph, pitched up outside off, Bumrah push-drives to mid-off
Naseem Shah to Kuldeep Yadav, no run, 142kph, fuller than a length, defended towards point with an opened bat-face
Naseem Shah to Bumrah, 1 run, 141kph, fullish delivery angled in, glanced to deep square leg
Naseem Shah to Kuldeep Yadav, 2 wides, 141kph, bumper, too short, Kuldeep Yadav half-ducks and Rizwan leaps to get a glove on it
Naseem Shah to Kuldeep Yadav, no run, 144kph, pacy length ball, Kuldeep Yadav defends and inside-edges onto his pads
Naseem Shah to Bumrah, 1 run, 144kph, short ball and Bumrah pulls it in front of square with one leg off the ground
Naseem Shah to Bumrah, no run, 143kph, full delivery, defensively pushed back to Naseem
Naseem Shah to Thakur, out Caught by Shadab Khan,, Excellent catch, 139kph, Thakur wants to tuck this length ball into the leg-side
Shaheen Afridi to Jadeja, out Caught by Rizwan,, The edge is found on this occasion and Jadeja is gone, 137kph, slightly fuller and the line is wider
Shaheen Afridi to Jadeja, no run, 138kph, tries to steer this length ball down to third man and misses
Shaheen Afridi to Jadeja, no run, 141kph, Jadeja miscues the drive to cover
Shaheen Afridi to Thakur, 3 runs, straighter line and Thakur wrists it through mid-wicket
Shaheen Afridi to Thakur, no run, 137kph, in-slanting length ball, tapped towards cover

Shaheen Afridi to Hardik Pandya, out Caught by Agha Salman,, The dangerous Hardik Pandya is gone, 119kph, slower delivery, full and outside off from round the wicket, Hardik is early into his drive, the bottom hand comes off the handle and he spoons it to cover
Naseem Shah to Jadeja, no run, 142kph, Jadeja moves leg-side and misses the flick as Naseem follows the batter with a full delivery
Naseem Shah to Jadeja, no run, 144kph, Jadeja misses the flick to get hit on the back leg
Naseem Shah to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, 145kph, too close to be cutting/dabbing
Naseem Shah to Hardik Pandya, no run, 141kph, extra bounce, Hardik Pandya pushes at it and hits him high on the bat before rolling towards cover
Naseem Shah to Jadeja, 1 run, 144kph, short of length ball, Jadeja is late on the flick and he inside-edges it to square leg
Naseem Shah to Jadeja, no run, 143kph, pitched up ball, Jadeja drives straight to cover
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, no run, 93kph, googly, Hardik Pandya is beaten on the inside edge as he gets forward to block
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, FOUR, misfield and four, Shortish outside off, cut hard by Hardik Pandya
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 2 runs, 89kph, worked through mid-wicket for a brace
Shadab Khan to Jadeja, 1 run, 90kph, full delivery outside off, Jadeja leans and drives along the ground to long-off
Shadab Khan to Jadeja, no run, 96kph, off-stump line, Jadeja taps it to point off the back foot
Shadab Khan to Jadeja, FOUR, 90kph, shortish ball, Jadeja quickly treks back and pulls it through mid-wicket
Naseem Shah to Hardik Pandya, no run, 146kph, fullish delivery, Hardik Pandya opens his bat-face to dink it to backward point
Naseem Shah to Jadeja, 1 run, 143kph, Naseem attacks the sticks and Jadeja looks to drive
Naseem Shah to Jadeja, 2 runs, B0$, leg-lined, flicked to deep backward square leg
Naseem Shah to Jadeja, no run, 144kph, away-angler, patted to cover
Naseem Shah to Jadeja, 2 runs, 141kph, short of length ball, leg-lined, Jadeja shuffles and tucks it away to deep mid-wicket
Naseem Shah to Jadeja, no run, back of a length delivery, turned to mid-wicket
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, no run, slower delivery outside off, Hardik Pandya steers it to point
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, no run, directed at the stumps, Hardik Pandya defends it from within the crease
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, FOUR, forehand smash, Shortish delivery and Hardik Pandya hammers his pull through mid-wicket for the third boundary of this over
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, no run, shortish delivery outside off, Hardik Pandya shoulders arms
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, FOUR, deft touch, Short of a length outside off, Hardik Pandya opens the bat face and guides it to third man for back-to-back boundaries
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, FOUR, cracking shot, Short and wide outside off, Hardik Pandya cuts it through backward point for four runs
Shadab Khan to Jadeja, 2 runs, drifting on the pads, clipped through the leg-side for a brace
Shadab Khan to Jadeja, no run, driven back to the bowler by Jadeja
Shadab Khan to Jadeja, no run, on the pads, Jadeja nudges this to square leg
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, guides this towards short third man by playing late, stopped by the fielder stationed there
Shadab Khan to Jadeja, 1 run, tossed up delivery on middle and leg, pushed to long-on for a single
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, played through cover by Hardik Pandya
Haris Rauf to Jadeja, no run, 145kph, short of a length outside off, cut to point
Haris Rauf to Jadeja, no run, full and quick on leg, Jadeja looks to flick it away, but gets hit on the pads
Haris Rauf to Jadeja, no run, nudged into the leg-side by Jadeja as he faces his first ball
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, out Caught by Babar Azam,, Third wicket for Haris Rauf as he breaks the partnership
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, skids along the deck on off, Hardik Pandya punches it into the pocket at cover-point
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, no run, banged in short by Haris Rauf as Pandya leaves it alone
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, 2 runs, flat-bats this over the bowler and takes a brace to end the over
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, fraction short outside off, chopped towards backward point by Hardik Pandya
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 2 runs, 200 up for India, Whistles in the crowd as Hardik and Ishan are entertaining them and scoring much needed runs
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, SIX, smoked over deep mid-wicket, Hardik Pandya goes down on his knee and brings out the slogsweep, sends this sailing over deep mid-wicket for half-a-dozen
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, on a length on middle and leg, knocked to long-on by Ishan Kishan for a single
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, FOUR, excellent shot, Goes deep back in his crease, it's a short ball and Ishan Kishan pulls this towards deep mid-wicket for a one-bounce boundary
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, no run, comfortably blocks this length delivery towards mid-off does Hardik Pandya
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, 2 runs, Pakistan continue to fumble and struggle in the field
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, back of a length on middle and leg, Ishan Kishan clips it through the leg-side for a single
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, pulls this shortish delivery through the leg-side for a single
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, no run, short of a length around off, knocked to mid-off by Hardik Pandya
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, no run, skids along the deck does this shortish delivery, Hardik Pandya gets beaten on the outside edge
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, no run, tad short outside off, Ishan Kishan chops it towards short third man
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, tossed up delivery around off, Hardik Pandya drives this along the carpet to long-off for a single
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, that keeps a touch low as Ishan Kishan works it into the pocket at mid-wicket
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, flatter through the air, pushed into the pocket at cover for a single
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, way too short, Ishan Kishan rocks back and pulls this over mid-wicket for a single
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, full and straight outside off, the batter squeezes it into the off-side for a single
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, fifty for Hardik Pandya, Drives this along the carpet to long-on and notches up a fine fifty does Hardik Pandya
Agha Salman to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, driven to long-off for a single
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, fired on the batter's pads, flicked through the leg-side for a single
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, 2 runs, driven to long-on by Hardik and a fumble by the fielder in the deep results in the second run
Agha Salman to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, gets an inside edge towards the off-side for a single
Agha Salman to Ishan Kishan, FOUR, nicely done
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, Nawaz goes short as Ishan Kishan drags this to long-on for a single
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, no run, pushed to cover by Ishan Kishan, can't get it past the fielder
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, no run, spinning into the batter around off, Kishan goes for a cut, gets an inside edge on to the pads
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, SIX, 100-run stand up, Right into the slot and Kishan has smashed this over the bowler's head for half-a-dozen
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, no run, on a length around middle and leg, spinning into the batter as Ishan Kishan nudges it into the leg-side
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, finally a good effort from Afridi
Agha Salman to Ishan Kishan, no run, way too short on middle and leg, keeps low, Ishan Kishan looks to drag this through the leg-side, gets hit on the pads
Agha Salman to Ishan Kishan, wide, quicker delivery down the leg-side, Ishan Kishan looks to flick it away, but misses
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, pushed through by Agha Salman, Hardik Pandya works it towards the leg-side for a single
Agha Salman to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, way too short and Ishan Kishan drags it to long-on with a pull
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, full and straight at the stumps, Hardik Pandya flicks this through mid-wicket for a single
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, no run, a lot slower through the air, Hardik Pandya guides it back to Agha Salman
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, no run, on the batter's pads who works this towards square leg
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, chopped to point by Hardik Pandya for a single to end the over, another fumble by the fielder
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, squeezed to long-on by Ishan Kishan for a single
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, sliced towards backward point by Hardik Pandya who was keen for the second too
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, drifting on the pads, nudged to short fine leg for a single
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, fraction short on off, Hardik Pandya pats it into the off-side for a single
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 2 runs, quicker through the air, Hardik Pandya drives it to wide long-off for a brace
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, on the batter's pads as Hardik Pandya works it through the on-side for a single
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, no run, very full ball on off, Hardik Pandya squeezes it down the pitch
Agha Salman to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, swept through square leg by Ishan Kishan for a single
Agha Salman to Ishan Kishan, no run, quicker delivery on off, Ishan Kishan taps it into the off-side
Agha Salman to Ishan Kishan, no run, goes down for the sweep, towards short fine leg though
Agha Salman to Ishan Kishan, no run, fails to middle this one as he attempts a slogsweep
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, flatter delivery as Ishan Kishan punches it to long-on for one
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, FOUR, short and punished, Was a half-tracker that Ishan Kishan pulls hard towards wide long-on and Shaheen Afridi in the deep misfields as it results in four runs
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, no run, fraction short on middle and leg, nudged to mid-wicket by Ishan Kishan
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, driven down the wicket by Hardik Pandya for a single
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, fifty for Kishan, A quality knock and it has come when India needed him the most
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, no run, floated on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, no run, fired on middle and leg, flicked to mid-wicket by the batter
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, 2 runs, Agha Salman goes full around off and Hardik Pandya drives it through cover for a brace
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, no run, flatter around off, Hardik Pandya defends it watchfully
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, no run, touch fuller on off, pushed back to the bowler
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, no run, stands tall and knocks this back to the bowler
Agha Salman to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, heaved towards wide wide long-on for a single
Agha Salman to Hardik Pandya, no ball, 1 run, eased to long-off by Hardik Pandya for a single
Shaheen Afridi to Ishan Kishan, no run, touch fuller around off, pushed to mid-off by Ishan Kishan
Shaheen Afridi to Ishan Kishan, no run, knocked down the pitch by Ishan Kishan this time
Shaheen Afridi to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, short of a length outside off, Hardik Pandya cuts this through point for a single
Shaheen Afridi to Hardik Pandya, no run, on the batter's pads as Hardik Pandya nudges this to mid-on
Shaheen Afridi to Hardik Pandya, no run, on a length around off, Hardik Pandya knocks it down the pitch
Shaheen Afridi to Hardik Pandya, no run, short of a length outside off, Hardik Pandya steers this to point
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, 89kph, eases the drive to long-off
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, no run, 92kph, driven to left of cover and Ishan Kishan is halfway down
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, another overpitched delivery but Nawaz gets away
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, no run, 88kph, hint of spin, Ishan Kishan stays back to defend it out on the off-side
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, FOUR, tossed up, overpitched outside off and Ishan Kishan latches onto it
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, swept to deep square leg

Shaheen Afridi to Hardik Pandya, no run, 135kph, in-angling length ball, Hardik Pandya drives it back to the bowler off the inner edge which also deflected onto his pad
Shaheen Afridi to Hardik Pandya, FOUR, that's a super shot, 135kph, shortish delivery without any venom, Hardik Pandya stands tall and short-arm-jabs the pull between mid-on and mid-wicket
Shaheen Afridi to Hardik Pandya, no run, 133kph, tapped to backward point
Shaheen Afridi to Hardik Pandya, no run, 133kph, short of length ball, Pandya guides it straight to backward point
Shaheen Afridi to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, on a length and wide of off, cut to deep point
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 2 runs, opens his bat-face to steer this non-turner to the right of the diving backward point fielder
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, no run, ripper, Drifts in, lands around off and grips to go past the driving outside edge of Hardik Pandya
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, no run, 89kph, in-drifter, middle-stump line, blocked
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, 86kph, slightly on the shorter side and Ishan Kishan quickly rocks back to pull
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, no run, 87kph, full around off, Ishan Kishan stonewalls off the front foot
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, driven off the front foot to sweeper cover
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, drifting in on leg, worked in front of square on the leg-side
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, worked through mid-wicket off the back foot
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, no run, clipped to the left of mid-wicket who makes a diving stop
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, driven to deep cover off the front foot
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, no run, 83kph, loopy ball and very full outside off, squeezed to backward point
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 2 runs, dropped short outside off, keeps a bit low outside off and Hardik Pandya scythes it to deep point
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, 91kph, touch too full and Hardik Pandya drives to long-off
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, no run, 92kph, darted in on leg, drilled straight to mid-wicket
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, no run, 91kph, fullish ball, pushed back to the bowler
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, 88kph, bit of flight outside off, pushed through cover point
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, 2 runs, 91kph, late-cut towards short third man and a misfield allows the batters to take two
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, no run, non-turning length ball just outside off, tapped to point
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, 89kph, flatter in trajectory, punched to long-on

Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, FOUR, 94kph, width on offer and Ishan Kishan plays late to cut it behind square on the off-side
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, shortish outside off, cut to sweeper cover

Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, driven to long-off off the front foot
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, shortened length and that's been pulled away to deep mid-wicket

Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, FOUR, flat ball on leg and Hardik brings out the paddle sweep
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, no run, defended to cover off the front foot
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, full ball, driven to long-on
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, no run, 86kph, slow and full outside off, Hardik plays a premeditated paddle-sweep and miscues it to short fine leg

Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, no run, 93kph, very full ball, jammed to cover
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, leg-lined, worked around the corner - a single to deep backward square leg
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, no run, full in length, pushed into the off-side
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, driven with the spin to deep cover
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, no run, 89kph, flat ball on a length, played back at the bowler
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, no run, 88kph, not much spin outside off, Ishan Kishan shuffles and shoulders arms
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, 94kph, round the wicket, darted in on middle, pushed wide of cover
Nawaz to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, 91kph, covers the line on this occasion and punches to long-on
Nawaz to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, flat and full around off, driven through cover
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, no run, 148kph, beaten, Pitched up delivery and Kishan leans across to play a cover drive
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, no run, 149kph, full around off and Ishan Kishan defends into the off-side
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, no run, 151kph, Too quick for Ishan Kishan who slashes and misses this length ball outside off
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, byes, 1 run, 150kph, length ball that keeps low outside off, Hardik Pandya shoulders arms
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, Haris Rauf hurls it fuller and Ishan Kishan drives through cover point
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, FOUR, 146kph, Ishan Kishan takes the aerial route and it just eludes the leaping fielder in the deep
Shadab Khan to Hardik Pandya, 2 runs, 87kph, square-driven with the spin to deep point
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, dropped short and Shadab Khan gets away
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, FOUR, second boundary of the over, Another low full toss, attempted wrong 'un and Ishan Kishan drives firmly straight of mid-off
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, no run, 94kph, full in length, blocked back to the bowler
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, no run, 91kph, spinning in from a short of length, whipped to mid-wicket
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, FOUR, 87kph, low full toss from Shadab Khan and Ishan Kishan pounces
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, no run, 147kph, in-slanting short of length ball, Pandya defends to mid-on
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, 137kph, hint of width and Ishan Kishan cuts it to deep backward point
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, no run, 148kph, hits the deck hard, short of length ball, defended to mid-on
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, 1 run, 145kph, Rauf pulls his length back by a fraction, guided to third man
Haris Rauf to Hardik Pandya, FOUR, 149kph, length ball, Hardik Pandya gets forward and opens his bat-face to guide it to third man
Haris Rauf to Shubman Gill, out Bowled,, 147kph, fuller than good length, seams away a bit, Shubman Gill is half-forward to defend and gets an inside edge that clatters onto the sticks
Shadab Khan to Shubman Gill, 1 run, 87kph, leggie, hint of spin from a length and that's been patted through cover
Shadab Khan to Shubman Gill, no run, in-drifter, clipped to mid-wicket
Shadab Khan to Shubman Gill, no run, brings his bottom hand into play to drive, extra cover makes a diving stop to his left
Shadab Khan to Shubman Gill, no run, 85kph, loopy leggie, Shubman Gill leans forward and miscues the drive to extra cover
Shadab Khan to Ishan Kishan, 1 run, tossed up, full in length, Kishan pushes it to mid-off for a quick single
Shadab Khan to Shubman Gill, 1 run, starts with a flat ball that comes in with the angle, knocked to long-on
Naseem Shah to Ishan Kishan, no run, 143kph, off-stump line, defended into the off-side
Naseem Shah to Ishan Kishan, FOUR, 142kph, edged and four, Ishan Kishan would have had his heart in his mouth
Naseem Shah to Ishan Kishan, no run, 143kph, slightly fuller and Ishan Kishan gets forward to push it to mid-off
Naseem Shah to Ishan Kishan, no run, 144kph, stump-to-stump line, Ishan Kishan blocks off the front foot
Naseem Shah to Ishan Kishan, no run, 142kph, fuller than a length, pushed to point
Naseem Shah to Shubman Gill, 1 run, 136kph, pitched up outside off, Gill drives hard and outside-edges it well wide of first slip
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, no run, 146kph, skiddy ball on a good length, patted to backward point
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, no run, 147kph, in-slanter on the stumps, defended down the pitch
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, SIX, 138kph, short and wide outside off from round the wicket, Ishan Kishan hops and goes after it
Haris Rauf to Shubman Gill, 1 run, 148kph, back of a length delivery, a hopping Gill knocks it to the right of mid-on
Haris Rauf to Shubman Gill, no run, short and quick on middle and leg, tucked into the leg-side by Shubman Gill
Haris Rauf to Shubman Gill, no run, short ball outside off, Shubman Gill looks to pull, can't connect though
Naseem Shah to Ishan Kishan, 2 runs, 50 up for India
Naseem Shah to Ishan Kishan, no run, full toss on off, swings back in, Ishan Kishan goes for a drive, gets beaten on the inside edge
Naseem Shah to Ishan Kishan, no run, short of a length on leg, Ishan Kishan looks to work this away, gets hit on the thigh pad
Naseem Shah to Ishan Kishan, no run, short of a length on middle and leg, nudged to square leg by the batter
Naseem Shah to Ishan Kishan, no run, on a length around off, swings in and Ishan Kishan shoulders arms
Naseem Shah to Shubman Gill, byes, 1 run, short of a length outside off, shaping away from the batter, left alone and Rizwan fails to gather it cleanly, a bye taken
Haris Rauf to Ishan Kishan, no run, short and quick on off, Ishan Kishan rides the bounce and defends it into the off-side
Haris Rauf to Shreyas Iyer, out Caught by Fakhar Zaman,, Sharp catch by Fakhar Zaman, Was a short ball by Haris Rauf and Iyer pulls it straight to Fakhar at mid-wicket
Haris Rauf to Shubman Gill, 1 run, touch fuller on off, Shubman Gill goes for a drive, gets an outside edge to third man
Haris Rauf to Shubman Gill, no run, short of a length around off, Shubman Gill defends it from within the crease
Haris Rauf to Shubman Gill, FOUR, fired down the leg-side, Shubman Gill flicks it away to the fine leg fence with ease
Haris Rauf to Shreyas Iyer, 1 run, on a length around off, Shreyas Iyer steers this through backward point for a single

Haris Rauf to Shreyas Iyer, no run, knocked to mid-off by Shreyas Iyer

Haris Rauf to Shreyas Iyer, FOUR, creamed through cover, Was pitched up by the bowler outside off and Shreyas Iyer plays it off the front foot, drives it through cover-point anad manages to beat the fielder inside the ring
Haris Rauf to Shreyas Iyer, no run, guided back to the bowler as Haris Rauf goes full

Naseem Shah to Kohli, FOUR, Kohli opens his account with a four, And what a cracking shot too
Naseem Shah to Kohli, no run, short and quick outside off, some extra carry as Kohli shoulders arms
Naseem Shah to Kohli, 5 wides, too many wides already
Naseem Shah to Kohli, no run, 144kph, full and quick on middle and off, shaping away slightly, Kohli gets a leading edge towards cover-point as he tries to work this across the line

Naseem Shah to Shubman Gill, wide, fired down the leg-side and it's a wide ball

Shaheen Afridi to Rohit, no run, starts off with a fuller length delivery as Rohit defends it off his front foot
Shaheen Afridi to Rohit, no run, angled away from the batter outside off, Rohit shoulders arms
